p: To minimize the occurrence of lipid oxidation in milk, dietary inclusion of antioxidants seems to be very efficient [ 15]. Supplementation with Se increases the blood level of glutathione peroxidase in dairy cows [ 16], an enzyme that catalyzes the reduction of hydrogen peroxide, inhibiting lipid peroxidation [ 17]. Vitamin E, in turn, scavenges free radicals, which keeps the lipid hydroperoxide level low in cells and tissues [ 18].
